markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 3+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Anylength Rope](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2454)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Firebrands](/Sources.aspx?ID=196) pg. 84</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This 50-foot length of silk [rope](/Equipment.aspx?ID=44) is lightweight and appears to be inlaid with golden threads. The rope can hold up to 3,000 pounds and is particularly durable, with a Hardness of 5 and 24 Hit Points.

<document level="2" id="action-2007" />

<document level="2" id="action-2008" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 3"
pfs="Standard"
>
Anylength Rope (Lesser)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Firebrands](/Sources.aspx?ID=196) pg. 84</row>

**Price** 45 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 5"
pfs="Standard"
>
Anylength Rope (Moderate)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Firebrands](/Sources.aspx?ID=196) pg. 84</row>

**Price** 125 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

The rope is 75 feet long. You can activate the _moderate anylength rope_ once per hour instead of once per day.

<title
level="2"
right="Item 7"
pfs="Standard"
>
Anylength Rope (Greater)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Firebrands](/Sources.aspx?ID=196) pg. 84</row>

**Price** 300 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

The rope is 100 feet long. You can activate the _greater anylength rope_ without any frequency limit.
name: Anylength Rope (Greater)
